channel.title: MoparLeagues
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]Mopar has a couple different forums.[/b][/size] ([MoparScape and Moparcraft] maybe there's even more I don't know about) :o
How many of you guys would even use a forum for Leagues made by Mopar?

item.title: MoparLeagues
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:37, topic:425930”]RuneMopar?
MoparScape?

Oh wait…

Yea this site encompasses everything RS related as well, I don’t know what we’d do with an entire forum. What type of boards would be in it?[/quote]

Clans, tutorials/guides, discussion, updates, community based events that could be held commonly, questions, personal/group achievments, a market place for players to buy/sell items etc

Read full topic

item.title: MoparLeagues
item.dc:creator: @Nathan_R Nathan R
item.description:
@Nathan_R wrote:

MoparElite

Read full topic

item.title: MoparLeagues
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:36, topic:425930”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=528622.msg3855872#msg3855872 date=1324346251]

Should make an RS Discussion forum

There is this Section: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,161.0.html
^_^.
[/quote]

Wow really? Awesome! I’d never seen that before!

In all seriousness considering rs discussion is one of the most populated sub-forums and all subjects are cluttered into one. I would like to see an actual forum open up[/quote]
Yeah They should make Child Boards for Runescape Discussion

Read full topic

item.title: MoparLeagues
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:26, topic:425930”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=528622.msg3855917#msg3855917 date=1324347453]

Doubt it’d be done, but the only reason they created gamedev is because I guess they didn’t want moparscape to be too cluttered, and moparcraft had its own server, and it needed its own sections for minecraft related purposes if I remember correctly.

The talk of Minecraft flooded MSCP so they decided to create a new board, and it helps they had a server.
[/quote]
Well thats pretty much my point, + they can make more boards without making moparscape cluttered (Minecraft related boards)[/quote]
And currently we don’t have a lot (if any) LoL talk. Thus, no need for a board!

Read full topic
